original_text: The Lord answered him, ‘Understand that I will be with you! You will destroy the Midianites as if they were only one man.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 그에게 이르시되 내가 반드시 너와 함께 하리니 네가 미디안 사람 치기를 한 사람을 치듯 하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: 'Understand that I will be with you!
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 함께 있을 것을 이해하라!

sentences.original_text: as if they were only one man.'
